name: TRUCK CO. - WHITE (American Apparel Tee *Semi-Fitted*)
description:
BACKDRAFT - Truck Company

Printed on an American Apparel high quality 100% fine ring-spun combed cotton t-shirt. This lightweight fine jersey tee is smooth and tight-knit making it look as durable as heavier fabric but with a lighter feel. 

*Made in the USA
*Fabric weight 4.3 oz 

*Sizes - Our jersey tees are a little tight in the sleeves and may shrink some after washing. If you dont like a tight fitted look, we RECOMMEND buying ATLEAST ONE SIZE LARGER than you normally wear.

Size Chart:
                                        
Chest (inches)   42-44(L)   46-48(XL)   
Waist (inches)   33-34(L)   36-38(XL)    
  
*Washing - Just like any other screen printed shirt.

•Turn shirt inside out.
•Set wash temperature to cold.
•Do not bleach or dry clean.
•Line dry or tumble dry low. 
(We recommend line/hang drying on a rack so theres minimal shrinkage to the shirt.)


***WE ONLY SHIP WITHIN THE UNITED STATES. WE DONT SHIP INTERNATIONALLY. SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE. VISIT OUR FAQ PAGE FOR MORE INFO.***

name: Butterfly - Black **NEW!** (Ladies Bella Jersey Tee)
description:
BACKDRAFT Angels - Butterfly (Black)

Printed on a high quality soft, refined sheer cotton jersey short sleeve crewneck tee with added body length and a slim-fit silhouette.  Ideal for layering or for low-rise bottoms.  

* 100% cotton 3.2 oz., 110 gm/m2 sheer jersey tee.    
* Feminine fit. 
* Self febric collar. 
* Longer body length. 
 
*Sizes - Our jersey tees are a little tight and may shrink a tad upon washing. If you dont like them tight, we RECOMMEND buying ONE SIZE LARGER than you normally wear. Check out the size chart below.

Bella Sizing Chart:

SMALL: 
(Fits sizes: 0-4) (Chest to fit: 31"-33") (Inseam: 30"-31")

MEDIUM: 
(Fits sizes: 4-8) (Chest to fit: 34"-36") (Inseam: 31"-32")

LARGE: 
(Fits sizes: 8-10) (Chest to fit: 37"-39") (Inseam: 32"-33")

X-LARGE:
(Fits sizes: 10-12) (Chest to fit: 39"-41") (Inseam: 33.5"-34")

*Washing - Just like any other screen printed shirt.

•Turn shirt inside out. 
•Set wash temperature to cold. 
•Do not bleach or dry clean. 
•Line dry or tumble dry low. 
(We recommend line/hang drying on a rack so theres minimal shrinkage to the shirt.)

***WE ONLY SHIP WITHIN THE UNITED STATES. WE DONT SHIP INTERNATIONALLY. SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE. VISIT OUR FAQ PAGE FOR MORE INFO.***

name: ENGINE CO. - BROWN **NEW!** (Hanes Beefy T)
description:
BACKDRAFT - Engine Company

Printed on high quality preshrunk Hanes Beefy-T 100% ringspun cotton t-shirt.  This cotton tee features a double-needle coverseam stitch around the neck aswell the sleeve and bottom hem. It also features a shoulder-to-shoulder taper for a better fit. A rugged shirt with a softer feel.

*Fabric weight 6.1 oz

*Sizes - Our tees may shrink a little upon washing. If you dont like a semi-fitted shirt feel we RECOMMEND you consider ONE SIZE LARGER than you normally wear. Check out the chart below to get the right size for you.

Size Chart: 

MEDIUM: (Chest 38-40)
Body Width: 20" 
Body Length: 29 
Sleeve Length (top): 8 3/4
Across Shoulder: 19 1/4 

LARGE: (Chest 42-44)
Body Width: 22" 
Body Length: 30 
Sleeve Length (top): 8 1/2
Across Shoulder: 21 1/4 

X-LARGE: (Chest 46-48)
Body Width: 24" 
Body Length: 31 
Sleeve Length (top): 8 1/2
Across Shoulder: 23 1/4 

2X-LARGE: (Chest 50-52)
Body Width: 26" 
Body Length: 31 1/2 
Sleeve Length (top): 8 1/2
Across Shoulder: 25 1/4 


*Washing - Just like any other screen printed shirt.

•Turn shirt inside out. 
•Set wash temperature to cold. 
•Do not bleach or dry clean. 
•Line dry or tumble dry low. 
(We recommend line/hang drying on a rack so theres minimal shrinkage to the shirt.)

***WE ONLY SHIP WITHIN THE UNITED STATES. WE DONT SHIP INTERNATIONALLY. SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE. VISIT OUR FAQ PAGE FOR MORE INFO.***
